title: What major event happened in 1620? - Quora

response.answer_text: Really??? September 6: The Mayflower sets sail from Plymouth with 102 passengers on board. November 19: The Mayflower lands in America. November 21: The Pilgrim Fathers, who arrived in the English colonies in America on the Mayflower, sign the Mayflower Treaty, the constitution of the colony of Plymouth, near Cape Cod. December 21: A group of Pilgrim Fathers who arrived in the New World on the Mayflower forms a settlement on the mainland. December 26th: More Pilgrim Fathers arrive at what will later become Plymouth, Massachusetts, and establish a settler colony. Eeeyyy dude! I am German and know it! (OK the exact dates I had to research)
